title.narrative: Service Delivery of the Family Planning Programme in Kenya

description.narrative: This activity (Service Delivery of the Family Planning Programme in Kenya) is a component of Delivering Increased Family Planning Across Rural Kenya reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £27,261,209. This component benefits Kenya, and works in the following sector(s): Family planning, STD control including HIV/AIDS, Business Policy and Administration. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 24-09-2012 and the end date is 31-03-2019.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
